location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No. 233: Captain Arnold Burrowes Kemball, Resident in the Persian Gulf, Bushire, to Commodore George Robinson, Commander of the Indian Naval Squadron in the Persian Gulf

mods.abstract: In this letter Arnold Burrowes Kemball, Resident in the Persian Gulf, encloses a translation of a statement, dated 22 June 1852, by the Native Agent at Shargah [Sharjah], Hajee Yacoob, regarding the maltreatment of his dependants by the Governor [Abdullah bin Sulṭān] and people of Shargah.
